[{"id":"72","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"test","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>tetsdgdfg<\/p>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"test-120","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"3","icon":null,"icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1585243038","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"1","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"testgsgsd","seo_title_en":"","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"testsdgsdg","seo_keywords_en":"","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"testsdgsd","seo_description_en":"","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_1_en":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_2_en":"","gia_tri_3_vi":"","gia_tri_3_en":"","thongso_vi":"","thongso_en":""},{"id":"16","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"B\u1ea3o H\u00e0nh","tenbaiviet_en":"Guarantee","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>C&ocirc;ng ty TNHH C&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; Th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t chuy&ecirc;n ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c S\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, kinh doanh, thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf, l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i qu\u1ea1t c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng phun s\u01b0\u01a1ng, l&agrave;m m&aacute;t, h&uacute;t b\u1ee5i c\u1ea5p kh&iacute; s\u1ea1ch, t\u1ea1o &aacute;p \u0111i\u1ec1u h&ograve;a kh&ocirc;ng kh&iacute;&hellip; cho c&aacute;c nh&agrave; m&aacute;y, c&ocirc;ng tr&igrave;nh, nh&agrave; x\u01b0\u1edfng.<br \/>\r\nC&ocirc;ng ty \u0111&atilde; m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng, x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng v&agrave; ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n nh&agrave; m&aacute;y s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, l\u1eafp r&aacute;p Qu\u1ea1t c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh theo H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ISO 9001-2008 t\u1ea1i Khu c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p Ho&agrave;ng Mai &ndash; H&agrave; N\u1ed9i.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>TI\u1ec0M N\u0102NG V&Agrave; TH\u1ebe M\u1ea0NH V\u01af\u1ee2T TR\u1ed8I<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t l&agrave; nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t cung c\u1ea5p v&agrave; ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i \u0111\u1ed9c quy\u1ec1n c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m mang th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u DETON tr&ecirc;n l&atilde;nh th\u1ed5 Vi\u1ec7t Nam trong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m qua bao g\u1ed3m: &ndash; C&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i qu\u1ea1t c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng phun s\u01b0\u01a1ng, l&agrave;m m&aacute;t, h&uacute;t b\u1ee5i, c\u1ea5p kh&iacute; s\u1ea1ch, t\u1ea1o &aacute;p \u0111i\u1ec1u ho&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng kh&iacute;&hellip; cho nh&agrave; m&aacute;y, c&ocirc;ng tr&igrave;nh, nh&agrave; x\u01b0\u1edfng, khu ch\u1ebf xu\u1ea5t,&hellip; tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<br \/>\r\nTrong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m qua, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i li&ecirc;n t\u1ee5c d&agrave;nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng l\u1edbn: Huy Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng V&agrave;ng cho S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m Qu\u1ea1t c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; Cup V&agrave;ng ghi nh\u1eadn l&agrave; doanh nghi\u1ec7p xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc ti&ecirc;u bi\u1ec3u t\u1ea1i H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf Vi\u1ec7t Nam (Vi\u1ec7t Nam EXPO 2011)..vv.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"377\" src=\"\/2020_ducviet\/datafiles\/images\/5.jpg\" width=\"810\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t \u0111&atilde; ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i tr&ecirc;n h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft c&aacute;c t\u1ec9nh th&agrave;nh, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng b\u1ea3o h&agrave;nh tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c c\u0169ng \u0111ang ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n nh\u1eb1m \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o m\u1ecdi quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i c\u1ee7a kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng.<br \/>\r\nC&ocirc;ng ty \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt, t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n v&agrave; b\u1ea3o h&agrave;nh cho m\u1ecdi d\u1ef1 &aacute;n c\u1ee7a doanh nghi\u1ec7p. Ti&ecirc;u ch&iacute; h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a c&ocirc;ng ty l&agrave; t\u1eadp trung v&agrave;o vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p c&aacute;c gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb gia t\u0103ng, c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c l&agrave;m m&aacute;t, th&ocirc;ng gi&oacute; v&agrave; \u0111i\u1ec1u &aacute;p.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>M\u1ee4C TI&Ecirc;U<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i lu&ocirc;n h\u01b0\u1edbng t\u1edbi s\u1ef1 ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n, kh&ocirc;ng ng\u1eebng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 m&aacute;y m&oacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v&agrave; c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 ti&ecirc;n ti\u1ebfn, ch\u0103m s&oacute;c \u0111&agrave;o t\u1ea1o \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 ch\u1ea5t x&aacute;m, c&ocirc;ng nh&acirc;n l&agrave;nh ngh\u1ec1 v&agrave; to&agrave;n b\u1ed9 lao \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ec3 C&ocirc;ng ty \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t l&agrave; m\u1ed9t t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 v\u1eefng m\u1ea1nh v\u01b0\u01a1n l&ecirc;n v\u1eefng ch\u1eafc, ho&agrave; nh\u1eadp v&agrave;o s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n chung c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ea5t n\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Duc Viet Industry and Trading Co., Ltd specializes in manufacturing, trading, designing and installing all kinds of industrial fans, misting system, cooling, vacuuming clean air supply, pressurizing. air conditioning ... for factories, works, workshops.<br \/>\r\nThe company has expanded, built and developed a factory to manufacture and assemble industrial fans operated by ISO 9001-2008 Quality Management System in Hoang Mai Industrial Park - Hanoi.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>POTENTIAL AND POWERFUL<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>Duc Viet Company is an exclusive manufacturer and distributor of DETON branded products in Vietnam for many years, including: - Industrial fans, misting, cooling and suction systems dust, clean air supply, creating air conditioners ... for factories, constructions, factories, export processing zones, ... nationwide.<br \/>\r\nFor many years, we have continuously won great awards: the Gold Medal for Industrial Fan Products and the Gold Cup as a typical outstanding enterprise at Vietnam International Trade Fair (Vietnam EXPO). 2011) .. etc.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"377\" src=\"\/2020_ducviet\/datafiles\/images\/5.jpg\" width=\"810\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>SERVICE<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>Duc Viet has developed a distribution system in most provinces, a nationwide warranty system is also completed to ensure all the interests of customers.<br \/>\r\nDuc Viet Company provides a full range of technical solutions, advice and warranty for all projects of the business. The company&#39;s primary focus is on providing value-added, product solutions to customers in the areas of cooling, ventilation and pressurization.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>TARGET<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>We are always aiming to complete, constantly invest in advanced machinery and equipment, take care of and train the gray matter team, skilled workers and all employees to make Duc Viet Company a collective. strong and steady rise, integration into the common development of the country.<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"bao-hanh","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"2","icon":"","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1584948435","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"2","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"B\u1ea3o H\u00e0nh","seo_title_en":"Guarantee","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"B\u1ea3o H\u00e0nh","seo_keywords_en":"Guarantee","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"B\u1ea3o H\u00e0nh","seo_description_en":"Guarantee","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_1_en":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_2_en":"","gia_tri_3_vi":"","gia_tri_3_en":"","thongso_vi":null,"thongso_en":null},{"id":"15","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"B\u1ea3o D\u01b0\u1ee1ng","tenbaiviet_en":"Maintenance","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>C&ocirc;ng ty TNHH C&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; Th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t chuy&ecirc;n ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c S\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, kinh doanh, thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf, l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i qu\u1ea1t c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng phun s\u01b0\u01a1ng, l&agrave;m m&aacute;t, h&uacute;t b\u1ee5i c\u1ea5p kh&iacute; s\u1ea1ch, t\u1ea1o &aacute;p \u0111i\u1ec1u h&ograve;a kh&ocirc;ng kh&iacute;&hellip; cho c&aacute;c nh&agrave; m&aacute;y, c&ocirc;ng tr&igrave;nh, nh&agrave; x\u01b0\u1edfng.<br \/>\r\nC&ocirc;ng ty \u0111&atilde; m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng, x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng v&agrave; ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n nh&agrave; m&aacute;y s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, l\u1eafp r&aacute;p Qu\u1ea1t c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh theo H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ISO 9001-2008 t\u1ea1i Khu c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p Ho&agrave;ng Mai &ndash; H&agrave; N\u1ed9i.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>TI\u1ec0M N\u0102NG V&Agrave; TH\u1ebe M\u1ea0NH V\u01af\u1ee2T TR\u1ed8I<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t l&agrave; nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t cung c\u1ea5p v&agrave; ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i \u0111\u1ed9c quy\u1ec1n c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m mang th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u DETON tr&ecirc;n l&atilde;nh th\u1ed5 Vi\u1ec7t Nam trong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m qua bao g\u1ed3m: &ndash; C&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i qu\u1ea1t c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng phun s\u01b0\u01a1ng, l&agrave;m m&aacute;t, h&uacute;t b\u1ee5i, c\u1ea5p kh&iacute; s\u1ea1ch, t\u1ea1o &aacute;p \u0111i\u1ec1u ho&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng kh&iacute;&hellip; cho nh&agrave; m&aacute;y, c&ocirc;ng tr&igrave;nh, nh&agrave; x\u01b0\u1edfng, khu ch\u1ebf xu\u1ea5t,&hellip; tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<br \/>\r\nTrong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m qua, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i li&ecirc;n t\u1ee5c d&agrave;nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng l\u1edbn: Huy Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng V&agrave;ng cho S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m Qu\u1ea1t c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; Cup V&agrave;ng ghi nh\u1eadn l&agrave; doanh nghi\u1ec7p xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc ti&ecirc;u bi\u1ec3u t\u1ea1i H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf Vi\u1ec7t Nam (Vi\u1ec7t Nam EXPO 2011)..vv.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"377\" src=\"\/2020_ducviet\/datafiles\/images\/5.jpg\" width=\"810\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t \u0111&atilde; ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i tr&ecirc;n h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft c&aacute;c t\u1ec9nh th&agrave;nh, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng b\u1ea3o h&agrave;nh tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c c\u0169ng \u0111ang ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n nh\u1eb1m \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o m\u1ecdi quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i c\u1ee7a kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng.<br \/>\r\nC&ocirc;ng ty \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt, t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n v&agrave; b\u1ea3o h&agrave;nh cho m\u1ecdi d\u1ef1 &aacute;n c\u1ee7a doanh nghi\u1ec7p. Ti&ecirc;u ch&iacute; h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a c&ocirc;ng ty l&agrave; t\u1eadp trung v&agrave;o vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p c&aacute;c gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb gia t\u0103ng, c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c l&agrave;m m&aacute;t, th&ocirc;ng gi&oacute; v&agrave; \u0111i\u1ec1u &aacute;p.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>M\u1ee4C TI&Ecirc;U<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i lu&ocirc;n h\u01b0\u1edbng t\u1edbi s\u1ef1 ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n, kh&ocirc;ng ng\u1eebng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 m&aacute;y m&oacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v&agrave; c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 ti&ecirc;n ti\u1ebfn, ch\u0103m s&oacute;c \u0111&agrave;o t\u1ea1o \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 ch\u1ea5t x&aacute;m, c&ocirc;ng nh&acirc;n l&agrave;nh ngh\u1ec1 v&agrave; to&agrave;n b\u1ed9 lao \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ec3 C&ocirc;ng ty \u0110\u1ee9c Vi\u1ec7t l&agrave; m\u1ed9t t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 v\u1eefng m\u1ea1nh v\u01b0\u01a1n l&ecirc;n v\u1eefng ch\u1eafc, ho&agrave; nh\u1eadp v&agrave;o s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n chung c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ea5t n\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Duc Viet Industry and Trading Co., Ltd specializes in manufacturing, trading, designing and installing all kinds of industrial fans, misting system, cooling, vacuuming clean air supply, pressurizing. air conditioning ... for factories, works, workshops.<br \/>\r\nThe company has expanded, built and developed a factory to manufacture and assemble industrial fans operated by ISO 9001-2008 Quality Management System in Hoang Mai Industrial Park - Hanoi.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>POTENTIAL AND POWERFUL<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>Duc Viet Company is an exclusive manufacturer and distributor of DETON branded products in Vietnam for many years, including: - Industrial fans, misting, cooling and suction systems dust, clean air supply, creating air conditioners ... for factories, constructions, factories, export processing zones, ... nationwide.<br \/>\r\nFor many years, we have continuously won great awards: the Gold Medal for Industrial Fan Products and the Gold Cup as a typical outstanding enterprise at Vietnam International Trade Fair (Vietnam EXPO). 2011) .. etc.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"377\" src=\"\/2020_ducviet\/datafiles\/images\/5.jpg\" width=\"810\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>SERVICE<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>Duc Viet has developed a distribution system in most provinces, a nationwide warranty system is also completed to ensure all the interests of customers.<br \/>\r\nDuc Viet Company provides a full range of technical solutions, advice and warranty for all projects of the business. The company&#39;s primary focus is on providing value-added, product solutions to customers in the areas of cooling, ventilation and pressurization.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>TARGET<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>We are always aiming to complete, constantly invest in advanced machinery and equipment, take care of and train the gray matter team, skilled workers and all employees to make Duc Viet Company a collective. strong and steady rise, integration into the common development of the country.<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"bao-duong","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"1","icon":null,"icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1584946414","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"2","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"B\u1ea3o D\u01b0\u1ee1ng","seo_title_en":"Maintenance","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"B\u1ea3o D\u01b0\u1ee1ng","seo_keywords_en":"Maintenance","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"B\u1ea3o D\u01b0\u1ee1ng","seo_description_en":"Maintenance","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_1_en":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_2_en":"","gia_tri_3_vi":"","gia_tri_3_en":"","thongso_vi":null,"thongso_en":null}]
